Server-Side API

All changes described in the ComboBox are applicable to the AutoComplete. AutoComplete can be bound to any collection, just define the DataTextField.

Other Options

OptionLabel

Old

Html.Telerik().DropDownList().Name(“DropDownList”).Placeholder(“Select…”)

New

Html.Kendo().DropDownList().Name(“DropDownList”).OptionLabel(“Select…”)
